cards.rules_text:
Flying
When Avian Augmenteers enters, create a 3/3 colorless Vehicle artifact token with crew 2.
Whenever an artifact you control enters, put your choice of a vigilance, menace, trample, or lifelink counter on up to one target Vehicle.

Until end of turn, target creature you control gets +3/+3 and gains “Whenever this creature fights, it fights up to one target creature you don't control.” Then it fights up to one target creature you don't control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Creativity loves all arts, even the martial.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace
When Dramatis Personae enters, you may create a 1/1 black Vampire Actor creature token with lifelink. If you don't, each player sacrifices a creature. Then repeat this process three more times.

Exploit, exploit, exploit [i](When this enters, for each exploit, you may sacrifice a creature. Exploits trigger sequentially.)[/i]
Whenever a creature you control exploits, exile the top card of target opponent's library face down. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it.

Reveal the top seven cards of your library. You may put a creature card with mana value 3 or less from among them or from your graveyard onto the battlefield with a deathtouch counter and a lifelink counter on it. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Trample, haste
Whenever a non-final chapter ability of a Saga you control resolves, you may put a lore counter on that Saga.
